thread.title: Good location and hotel was good- Bar not so good
thread.title_full: Good location and hotel was good- Bar not so good - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MJalrightalright
title: Good location and hotel was good- Bar not so good
text: The Hotel was good people were great -except the Bar - thy were rude and unfriendly- they are not interested in your business if you have more than a few people in your group. The hotel and staff was very good but if you have a group you may want to look elsewhere if you plan on getting a drink before dinner and a show.
